title: F14 Submission Form
description: Schema for the F14 Catalyst Proposal Submission Form

schemaReferenceNonUI.$comment: NOT UI: used to identify the kind of template document used.

singleLineTextEntry.$comment: UI - Single Line text entry without any markup or rich text capability.

multiLineTextEntry.$comment: UI - Multiline text entry without any markup or rich text capability.

dropDownSingleSelect.$comment: UI - Drop Down Selection of a single entry from the defined enum.

multiSelect.$comment: UI - Multiselect from the given items.

singleLineTextEntryList.$comment: UI - A Growable List of single line text (no markup or richtext).

tokenValueCardanoADA.$comment: UI - A Token Value denominated in Cardano ADA.

durationInMonths.$comment: UI - A Duration represented in total months.

yesNoChoice.$comment: UI - A Boolean choice, represented as a Yes/No selection.  Yes = true.

title.title: Proposal Title
title.description: A clear, unambiguous, and concise title for your proposal

applicant.title: Name and surname of main applicant
applicant.description: Name and surname of main applicant
applicant.x-guidance: Please provide the name and surname of the main applicant. The main applicant is considered as the individual responsible for the project and the person authorized to act on behalf of other applicants (where applicable).

type.title: Are you delivering this project as an individual or as an entity (whether formally incorporated or not)
type.description: Are you delivering this project as an individual or as an entity (whether formally incorporated or not)
type.x-guidance: Please select from one of the following: 1. Individual 2. Entity (Incorporated) 3. Entity (Not Incorporated)

coproposers.title: Co-proposers and additional applicants
coproposers.x-guidance: List any persons who are submitting the proposal jointly with the main applicant. Make sure you have confirmed approval/awareness with these individuals/accounts before adding them. If there is more than one proposer, identify the lead person who is authorized to act on behalf of other co-proposers. IMPORTANT A maximum of 6 (six) proposals can be led or co-proposed by the same applicant or enterprise. Please, reference Fund 13 rules for added detail.

requestedFunds.title: Requested funds in ADA
requestedFunds.description: The amount of funding requested for your proposal
requestedFunds.x-guidance: There is a minimum and a maximum amount of funding that can be requested in a single Catalyst proposal. These are outlined below per each category: Minimum Funding Amount per proposal: Cardano Open: A15,000 Cardano Uses Cases: A15,000 Cardano Partners: A500,000 Maximum Funding Amount per proposal: Cardano Open: Developers (technical): A200,000 â€¢ Ecosystem (non-technical): A100,000 Cardano Uses Cases: Concept A150,000 Product: A500,000 Cardano Partners: Enterprise R&D A2,000,000 Growth & Acceleration: A2,000,000

duration.title: Project Duration in Months
duration.description: Specify the expected duration of your project. Projects must be completable within 2-12 months.
duration.x-guidance: Minimum 2 months-Maximum 12 months. The scope of your funding request and this project is expected to produce the deliverables you specify in the proposal within 2-12 months If you believe your project will take longer than 12 months, consider reducing the project's scope so that it becomes achievable within 12 months If your project completes earlier than scheduled so long as you have submitted your PoAs and Project Close-out report and video then your project can be closed out.

translation.title: Translation Information
translation.description: Information about the proposal's language and translation status

translated.title: Auto-translated Status
translated.description: Indicate if your proposal has been auto-translated into English from another language

original.title: Original Language
original.description: If auto-translated, specify the original language of your proposal

notes.title: Translation Notes
notes.description: Additional notes about the translation or original language content

problem.title: Problem Statement
problem.description: Define the problem your proposal aims to solve

statement.title: Problem Description
statement.description: Clearly define the problem you aim to solve. This will be visible in the Catalyst voting app.
examples: The Cardano ecosystem lacks standardized tools for cross-protocol communication, resulting in fragmented user experiences and inefficient resource utilization.

impact.title: Impact Areas
impact.description: Select the areas that will be most impacted by solving this problem

solution.title: Solution Overview
solution.description: Describe your proposed solution to the problem

summary.title: Solution Summary
summary.description: Briefly describe your solution. Focus on what you will do or create to solve the problem.
examples: Develop an open-source integration framework that standardizes protocol communication and provides a unified API layer for seamless DeFi interactions.

approach.title: Technical Approach
approach.description: Outline the technical approach or methodology you will use

innovationAspects.title: Innovation Aspects
innovationAspects.description: Key innovative aspects of your solution

SupportingLinks.title: Supporting Documentation
SupportingLinks.description: Additional resources and documentation for your proposal

links.title: Resource Links
links.description: Links to relevant documentation, code repositories, or marketing materials. All links must use HTTPS.

description.title: Resource Description
description.description: Brief description explaining what this resource contains and why it's relevant
examples: Project's main GitHub repository containing all source code
Technical whitepaper detailing the solution architecture

mainRepository.title: Main Code Repository
mainRepository.description: Primary repository where the project's code will be hosted

documentation.title: Documentation URL
documentation.description: Main documentation site or resource for the project

dependencies.title: Project Dependencies
dependencies.description: External dependencies and requirements for project success

hasDependencies.title: Has Dependencies
hasDependencies.description: Indicate if your project has any dependencies on other organizations or technologies

name.title: Dependency Name
name.description: Name of the organization, technology, or resource

description.title: Description
description.description: Explain why this dependency is essential and how it affects your project

mitigationPlan.title: Mitigation Plan
mitigationPlan.description: How will you handle potential issues with this dependency

horizons.title: Project Horizons
horizons.description: Long-term vision and categorization of your project

category.title: Project Category
category.description: Select the most relevant category and tags for your project

primaryCategory.title: Primary Category
primaryCategory.description: Main category that best describes your project

subCategory.title: Sub-category
subCategory.description: Specific area within the main category

tags.title: Project Tags
tags.description: Additional tags to help categorize your project

impact.title: Project Impact
impact.description: Describe the expected impact of your project

timeframe.title: Impact Timeframe
timeframe.description: Expected timeframe to see meaningful impact

metrics.title: Impact Metrics
metrics.description: Key metrics to measure project success

target.title: Target Value
target.description: Target value or goal for this metric

measurement.title: Measurement Method
measurement.description: How this metric will be measured

proposalDetails.title: Proposal Details
proposalDetails.description: Detailed information about your proposal's solution, impact, and feasibility

solution.title: Solution Description
solution.description: Detailed description of your proposed solution

description.title: Solution Description
description.description: Provide a comprehensive description of your proposed solution
examples: Our solution involves developing a decentralized education platform that will...

uniqueValue.title: Unique Value Proposition
uniqueValue.description: What makes your solution unique and innovative?

targetAudience.title: Target Audience
targetAudience.description: Who will benefit from your solution?

implementation.title: Implementation Approach
implementation.description: How will you implement your solution?

impact.title: Project Impact
impact.description: Define and measure the impact of your project

communityBenefit.title: Community Benefit
communityBenefit.description: How will the Cardano community benefit from your project?

metrics.title: Impact Metrics
metrics.description: Specific metrics to measure project success

outputs.title: Project Outputs
outputs.description: Tangible outputs and deliverables from the project

capability.title: Capability & Feasibility
capability.description: Demonstrate your ability to deliver the project successfully

teamExperience.title: Team Experience
teamExperience.description: Describe your team's relevant experience and capabilities

feasibilityApproach.title: Feasibility Approach
feasibilityApproach.description: How will you validate the feasibility of your approach?

fundManagement.title: Fund Management
fundManagement.description: How will you ensure proper management and accountability of funds?

grantAmount.title: Grant Amount in ADA
grantAmount.description: Total grant amount requested in ADA

numberOfMilestones.title: Number of Milestones
numberOfMilestones.description: Total number of milestones including the final milestone

milestonesList.title: List of Milestones
milestonesList.description: Detailed description of each project milestone

title.title: Milestone Title
title.description: Short, descriptive title for the milestone

description.title: Milestone Description
description.description: Detailed description of what this milestone entails

deliverables.title: Deliverables
deliverables.description: Specific outputs and deliverables for this milestone

acceptanceCriteria.title: Acceptance Criteria
acceptanceCriteria.description: Specific criteria that must be met to consider this milestone complete

evidenceOfCompletion.title: Evidence of Completion
evidenceOfCompletion.description: How will you demonstrate that this milestone is complete?

finalMilestone.title: Final Milestone
finalMilestone.description: Project close-out milestone with final report and video

futureSteps.title: Future Steps
futureSteps.description: Plans for project continuation or future development

finalPitch.title: Final Pitch
finalPitch.description: Final project pitch including team, budget, and value proposition

team.title: Team Information
team.description: Details about the project team and their capabilities

members.title: Team Members
members.description: List of team members and their roles

name.title: Name
name.description: Full name of the team member

links.title: Professional Links
links.description: Links to professional profiles or past work

teamCapabilities.title: Team Capabilities
teamCapabilities.description: Overview of the team's collective capabilities and why they are best suited for this project

previousWork.title: Previous Work
previousWork.description: Examples of relevant previous work or projects

valueProposition.title: Value Proposition
valueProposition.description: Justification of the project's value for money

costBenefitAnalysis.title: Cost-Benefit Analysis
costBenefitAnalysis.description: Analysis of the project's costs versus its benefits to the Cardano ecosystem

impactMetrics.title: Impact Metrics
impactMetrics.description: Specific metrics that demonstrate value for money

longTermValue.title: Long-term Value
longTermValue.description: Description of the long-term value and sustainability of the project

communityBenefits.title: Community Benefits
communityBenefits.description: Specific benefits to the Cardano community

mandatoryAcknowledgments.title: Mandatory Acknowledgments
mandatoryAcknowledgments.description: Required acknowledgments and agreements for proposal submission

acknowledgment.title: Fund Rules Acknowledgment
acknowledgment.description: I confirm that I have read and agree to be bound by the Fund Rules

version.title: Fund Rules Version
version.description: Version of the Fund Rules being acknowledged

acknowledgment.title: Terms and Conditions Acknowledgment
acknowledgment.description: I confirm that I have read and agree to be bound by the Project Catalyst Terms and Conditions

version.title: Terms Version
version.description: Version of the Terms and Conditions being acknowledged

documentUrl.title: Terms Document URL
documentUrl.description: URL to the specific version of terms and conditions

acknowledgment.title: Privacy Policy Acknowledgment
acknowledgment.description: I acknowledge and agree that any data I share will be processed in accordance with the Catalyst FCS Privacy Policy

version.title: Privacy Policy Version
version.description: Version of the Privacy Policy being acknowledged

documentUrl.title: Privacy Policy URL
documentUrl.description: URL to the specific version of privacy policy

timestamp.title: Acknowledgment Timestamp
timestamp.description: When the privacy policy was acknowledged

acknowledgment.title: IP Rights Acknowledgment
acknowledgment.description: I confirm that I have the necessary rights to all intellectual property included in this proposal

details.title: IP Details
details.description: Additional details about intellectual property rights (if applicable)

attachments.title: IP Documentation
attachments.description: Supporting documentation for IP rights (if applicable)

timestamp.title: Acknowledgment Timestamp
timestamp.description: When the IP declaration was made

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance
legalCompliance.description: I confirm that my proposal complies with all applicable laws and regulations

noConflictOfInterest.title: No Conflict of Interest
noConflictOfInterest.description: I confirm that there are no undisclosed conflicts of interest

accurateInformation.title: Information Accuracy
accurateInformation.description: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete

jurisdictions.title: Applicable Jurisdictions
jurisdictions.description: List of jurisdictions where compliance is declared

timestamp.title: Acknowledgment Timestamp
timestamp.description: When the compliance declaration was made

additionalAcknowledgments.title: Additional Acknowledgments
additionalAcknowledgments.description: Any additional acknowledgments required for specific proposal types

description.title: Description
description.description: Detailed description of what is being acknowledged

documentUrl.title: Reference Document
documentUrl.description: URL to the document being acknowledged
